title: Traffic Bootstrap Campaign - Month 1 Performance Report
description:
Comprehensive Month 1 analysis of Traffic Bootstrap campaign performance.

## Report Sections

### 1. Executive Summary
- Total budget spent
- Total signups acquired
- Overall CAC
- Key wins and learnings

### 2. By Property
- **cats.center**: Traffic, signups, CAC, top channels
- **dnsscience.io**: Traffic, signups, CAC, top channels
- **veribits.com**: Traffic, signups, CAC, top channels

### 3. By Channel
- Organic (HN, Reddit, Twitter, SEO)
- Paid (Facebook, LinkedIn, Reddit Ads)
- Product Hunt

### 4. Recommendations
- What to scale
- What to kill
- Month 2 budget proposal
- New channels to test

## Deliverables
- Month 1 Report (PDF/Doc)
- Month 2 Campaign Plan
- Updated budget allocation
acceptance_criteria: CAC calculated per property and channel

comments.author: claude@afterdarksys.com
comments.text: Ticket created from Traffic Bootstrap planning session. Due: Jan 20, 2026 (end of Month 1).
